mapper.select: SELECT ID, COMMUNITY_TITLE, COMMUNITY_CONTENT, COMMUNITY_REGISTER_DATE, COMMUNITY_UPDATE_DATE, COMMUNITY_READ_COUNT, SORT_ID, USER_ID FROM TBL_COMMUNITY ORDER BY ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_COMMUNITY(ID, COMMUNITY_TITLE, COMMUNITY_CONTENT, SORT_ID, USER_ID) VALUES(SEQ_COMMUNITY.NEXTVAL, #{communityTitle}, #{communityContent}, #{sortId}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT C.ID, C.COMMUNITY_TITLE, C.COMMUNITY_CONTENT, C.COMMUNITY_REGISTER_DATE, C.COMMUNITY_UPDATE_DATE, C.COMMUNITY_READ_COUNT, S.SORT_NAME, U.USER_NICKNAME FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_COMMUNITY ORDER BY COMMUNITY_READ_COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3) C JOIN TBL_SORT S ON C.SORT_ID = S.ID JOIN TBL_USER U ON C.USER_ID = U.ID
